alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 7:40PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Trumbull and central Crawford Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 740 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sharpsville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Hubbard, Cortland, Cambridge Springs, Vienna Center, Adamsville, Guys Mills, Atlantic, Pymatuning Central, Vienna, Johnston, Cochranton, Saegertown, Conneaut Lake, Jamestown, Blooming Valley, Townville, Venango, Orangeville and Woodcock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Ohio...and northwestern Pennsylvania.
